product_name: Continental X-King Foldable Tire - 29 x 2.2 / 29 x 2.4
long_description: Continental X-King 29er foldable mountain bike tire offers great trail performance for big-wheeled riding. Tread is optimized to balance fast-rolling and cornering performance, all while delivering self-cleaning properties. 84 tpi casing with a folding bead to help keep weight low.
short_description: Continental X-King 29er foldable mountain bike tire offers great trail performance for big-wheeled riding.
